thread.title: 'See you in court' - Trump's furious tweet mocked on social media
thread.title_full: 'See you in court' - Trump's furious tweet mocked on social media

author: Adam Boult
title: 'See you in court' - Trump's furious tweet mocked on social media
text:
'See you in court' - Trump's furious tweet mocked on social media President Trump will see the court in court. Credit: MANDEL NGAN/AFP/GETTY IMAGES Adam Boult  04am 
A US court has refused to reinstate Donald Trump's controversial executive order banning refugees and restricting travel to the United States from seven Muslim-majority countries. 
After a panel of three judges at the San Francisco court of appeals upheld the halt placed on his travel ban, the President indicated he would now now take the case to the Supreme Court, tweeting in capital letters: "SEE YOU IN COURT, THE SECURITY OF OUR NATION IS AT STAKE!" 
In the 29-page ruling, the appeals court judges said the government had failed to provide enough evidence that urgently implementing the ban was necessarily for the country's security. SEE YOU IN COURT, THE SECURITY OF OUR NATION IS AT STAKE! — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) 9 February 2017 
H is reaction to the ruling was reemphasised with this post on the White House's Instagram account: A photo posted by Donald J. Trump (@realdonaldtrump) on Feb 9, 2017 at 4:04pm PST 
T he tweet quickly became a meme, inspiring countless sarcastic responses and parodies from critics of the President. Here are a few of them: “oh no, not court” —judges — both are equally bad (@caseyjohnston) February 10, 2017 I will see you judges, who literally work every single day in courts, in court — Colin Jones (@colinjones) February 10, 2017 "SEE YOU IN COURT"
